council_profile.name: Blackpool Council
council_profile.covers: Blackpool unitary authority area on the Fylde Coast
notable_issues: Most deprived local authority in England (IMD 2019 rank 1 of 317)
Lowest life expectancy in England (male 74.1, female 79.5)
High child poverty rate (>30% children in poverty)
Major regeneration projects: Conference Centre, Tramway extension, Central Business District
Tourism-dependent economy — seasonal employment patterns affect spending

data_quality.transparency_notes: Blackpool publishes monthly spending over £250 with both main supplier payments and purchase card transactions. Five different CSV formats used over the data period (2019 old format, 2020-2022 cost centre format, 2021 variant without Body Name, 2023-2024 CIAXLONE format, 2024+ clean 19-column format). Supplier names include REDACTED entries for personal data.

cross_council_context.note: Blackpool is a unitary authority providing all local government services. Not directly comparable to Lancashire district councils (which share upper-tier services with LCC). Comparable to Blackburn with Darwen as the other Lancashire unitary.
